rash.description: Erythematous rash characterized by palpable purpura and petechiae
rash.location: From axilla to lower abdomen, back, and lower extremities
rash.features: Face, neck, chest, upper extremities, and oral and nasal mucosa spared

abdomen.description: Nontender with a healed postoperative scar

relevant_findings.punch_biopsy: Performed on rash in lower abdomen

physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Improvement of rash initially with prednisone; recurrence at 10 mg/d dosing
